MIME-Version: 1.0

# Galician translation of chkrootkit's debconf templates
# This file is distributed under the same license as the chkrootkit packa=
ge.
# Jacobo Tarrio <jtarrio@debian.org>, 2007.
#
msgid ""
msgstr ""
"Project-Id-Version: chkrootkit\n"
"Report-Msgid-Bugs-To: chkrootkit@packages.debian.org\n"
"POT-Creation-Date: 2008-02-26 08:06+0100\n"
"PO-Revision-Date: 2008-02-26 22:17+0000\n"
"Last-Translator: Jacobo Tarrio <jtarrio@debian.org>\n"
"Language-Team: Galician <proxecto@trasno.net>\n"
"MIME-Version: 1.0\n"
"Content-Type: text/plain; charset=3DUTF-8\n"
"Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit\n"

#. Type: boolean
#. Description
#: ../templates:2001
#| msgid "Would you like to run chkrootkit automatically every day?"
msgid "Should chkrootkit be run automatically every day?"
msgstr "=C2=BFQuere executar chkrootkit automaticamente cada d=C3=ADa?"

#. Type: boolean
#. Description
#: ../templates:2001
#| msgid ""
#| "chkrootkit can be run automatically via cron.daily if you like.  If y=
ou "
#| "answer yes to this question, you'll also be given the opportunity to =
"
#| "specify options for the daily run."
msgid ""
"The chkrootkit program can be run automatically via a daily cron job. If=
 you "
"choose this option, you'll also be given the opportunity to specify opti=
ons "
"for the daily run."
msgstr ""
"P=C3=B3dese executar o programa chkrootkit automaticamente mediante unha=
 tarefa "
"diaria de cron. Se escolle esta opci=C3=B3n, tam=C3=A9n se lle ha dar a =
oportunidade "
"de especificar opci=C3=B3ns para a execuci=C3=B3n diaria."

#. Type: string
#. Description
#: ../templates:3001
msgid "Arguments to use with chkrootkit in the daily run:"
msgstr "Argumentos a empregar con chkrootkit na execuci=C3=B3n diaria:"

#. Type: string
#. Description
#: ../templates:3001
#| msgid ""
#| "The following are useful arguments to pass to chkrookit:\n"
#| "  * -r <root> specifies an alternate root directory\n"
#| "  * -n do not attempt to analyze nfs mounted files\n"
#| "  * -q run in quiet mode [highly recommended]"
msgid ""
"The following are useful arguments to pass to chkrookit:\n"
" -r <root>: use an alternate root directory;\n"
" -n       : do not attempt to analyze NFS-mounted files;\n"
" -q       : run in quiet mode [highly recommended]."
msgstr ""
"Estes son alg=C3=BAns argumentos =C3=BAtiles para lle pasar a chkrootkit=
:\n"
" -r <ra=C3=ADz>: emprega un directorio ra=C3=ADz alternativo;\n"
" -n       : non tenta analizar ficheiros montados por NFS;\n"
" -q       : executa en modo silencioso [recom=C3=A9ndase]."

#. Type: boolean
#. Description
#: ../templates:4001
#| msgid "Only report problems if they differ from yesterday's problems?"
msgid "Only report problems if they differ from previous day's problems?"
msgstr "=C2=BFInformar dos problemas s=C3=B3 se son diferentes dos do d=C3=
=ADa anterior?"

#. Type: boolean
#. Description
#: ../templates:4001
#| msgid ""
#| "Choosing yes here instructs the cron.daily call of chkrootkit to only=
 "
#| "report problems if they differ from the previous day's run."
msgid ""
"If you choose this option, chkrootkit will only report problems when the=
y "
"differ from the previous day's run."
msgstr ""
"Se escolle esta opci=C3=B3n, chkrootkit s=C3=B3 ha informar dos problema=
s se son "
"diferentes dos que apareceron na execuci=C3=B3n do d=C3=ADa anterior."

#. Type: boolean
#. Description
#: ../templates:4001
msgid ""
"Using this option is not recommended as it is likely to hide existing "
"security problems."
msgstr ""
"Non se recomenda empregar esta opci=C3=B3n xa que pode ocultar problemas=
 de "
"seguridade existentes."

#~ msgid "-q"
#~ msgstr "-q"

#~ msgid "What arguments would you like to pass to the daily chkrootkit r=
un?"
#~ msgstr "=C2=BFQue argumentos quere pasar =C3=A1 execuci=C3=B3n diaria =
de chkrootkit?"

#~ msgid "Use this option with care."
#~ msgstr "Empregue esta opci=C3=B3n con coidado."

--===============1448490593==--

We believe that the bug you reported is fixed in the latest version of
chkrootkit, which is due to be installed in the Debian FTP archive:

chkrootkit_0.48-1.diff.gz
  to pool/main/c/chkrootkit/chkrootkit_0.48-1.diff.gz

  to pool/main/c/chkrootkit/chkrootkit_0.48-1.dsc

  to pool/main/c/chkrootkit/chkrootkit_0.48-1_amd64.deb

  to pool/main/c/chkrootkit/chkrootkit_0.48.orig.tar.gz



A summary of the changes between this version and the previous one is
attached.

Thank you for reporting the bug, which will now be closed.  If you
have further comments please address them to 468079@bugs.debian.org,
and the maintainer will reopen the bug report if appropriate.

Debian distribution maintenance software
pp.
Francois Marier <francois@debian.org> (supplier of updated chkrootkit pac=
kage)

believe that there is a problem with it please contact the archive
administrators by mailing ftpmaster@debian.org)

Distribution: unstable
Urgency: low

Changed-By: Francois Marier <francois@debian.org>
Description:=20
 chkrootkit - Checks for signs of rootkits on the local system
Closes: 467531 468044 468079 468216 468480 469284 469300 469986 469988 47=
0151 470510 470950 471241
Changes:=20
 chkrootkit (0.48-1) unstable; urgency=3Dlow
 .
   * New upstream release (closes: #471241)
   * Set myself as maintainer for this orphaned package
   * Add upstream homepage and packaging git repo
   * Add watch file
 .
   * Packaging fixes:
    - Always run debconf-updatepo in the clean target
    - Bump Standards-Version to 3.7.3 and debhelper to 6
    - Cleaned-up copyright file
    - Remove empty prerm script
    - Fix make clean lintian warning
    - Don't translate default '-q' argument
    - Fix trivial errors in manpages
    - Remove unneeded lines in debian/rules
 .
   * Debconf templates:
    - Fix lintian warnings
    - New Norwegian translation (closes: #467531)
    - New Basque translation (closes: #468044)
    - New Finnish translation (closes: #468216)
    - New Vietnamese translation (closes: #468480)
    - New Russian translation (closes: #470510)
    - Updated Galician translation (closes: #468079)
    - Updated Spanish translation (closes: #469284)
    - Updated French translation (closes: #469300)
    - Updated Italian translation (closes: #469986)
    - Updated German translation (closes: #469988)
    - Updated Czech translation (closes: #470151)
    - Updated Portugese translation (closes: #470950)
